mapper.select: select t.*,t.PROC_INST_ID procInstId,t.PDEF_ID pdefId from WF_RU_INST t WHERE 1=1 and substr(pdef_id,0,1)='2' and proc_inst_id in ( select proc_inst_id from WF_RU_INST_CONTENT where table_name in ('XM_INSTANCE','YWSL_XJXQSQB','YWSL_GSHBSQB','YWSL_CHGZSQB') and contentvalue = #{xmid} )
select t.*,t.PROC_INST_ID procInstId,t.C_ACTIVITYID cActivityid from WF_TASK t where proc_inst_id = #{instid}
select * from GET_XCKC_FQ where id = #{id}
select * from get_sqbxx where id = #{id}
select * from get_xckcxx where id = #{id}

select userid from XTGL_USER where userid in ( select userid from XTGL_USERROLE WHERE ROLEID = ( select ROLEID from XTGL_ROLE where roletype = (select qsbh from XTGL_QSDYB where qybh = #{qybm}) and NOTE = '区所分派人')) and rownum = 1
select ROLEID from XTGL_ROLE where roletype = (select qsbh from XTGL_QSDYB where qybh = #{qybm}) and NOTE = '区所人员'
select * from XCKC_RWZB where KCZT <> '6' and id = #{id}

select count(1) from GET_XCKC_FQ t where 1=1
and t.rwzt = #{rwzt}
and t.xmjl = #{xmjl}
and t.xmbh LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{xmbh}, '%'))
and t.dwmc LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{dwmc},'%'))
and t.lxr LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{lxr},'%'))
and to_date(t.slrq,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_date(#{kssj},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_date(t.slrq,'yyyy-MM-dd') < to_date(#{jssj},'yyyy-MM-dd') +1

select * from GET_XCKCXX where id in( select xmid from xm_xckc_rela where xckcid in (select id from xckc_rwzb where kczt in ('1','2') and id in (select kcrwzbid from xckc_rwcb t where t.kcbm = #{type} and t.ZPRY is null) ) union all select sqid from xckc_rwzb where kczt in ('1','2') and id in (select kcrwzbid from xckc_rwcb t where t.kcbm = #{type} and t.ZPRY is null) )

select count(1) from xm_instance s where id in (select xmid from xm_xckc_rela where xckcid in (select id from xckc_rwzb where kczt = '1' and id in (select kcrwzbid from xckc_rwcb t where t.kcbm = #{type}) ))

select a.*,nvl(b.num,0) num from (select userid,username from xtgl_user where userid in (select userid from xtgl_userrole where roleid = #{roleid})) a left join (select zpry,count(1) num from xckc_rwcb where SFFK = '0' group by zpry) b on a.userid = b.zpry order by a.username

select * from xckc_rwcb where kcbm=#{type} and kcrwzbid in( select id from xckc_rwzb where 1=1
and kczt=#{kczt}
and kczt in ('1','2','3','4','5')
and kczt in ('1','2')
and (id in (select xckcid from xm_xckc_rela where xmid = #{xmid}) or SQID = #{xmid}) )
select * from xckc_rwcb where sffk = #{sffk} and kcrwzbid in( select id from xckc_rwzb where kczt='2' and (id in (select xckcid from xm_xckc_rela where xmid = #{xmid}) or SQID =#{xmid}) )
select bh id,mc codename from xtgl_kj order by bh
select bh id,mc codename from xtgl_gxcz order by bh
select bh id,mc codename from xtgl_gxsf order by bh
select bh id,mc codename from xtgl_fx order by bh

select * from GET_XCKCXX where id in (select xmid from xm_xckc_rela where xckcid in (select id from xckc_rwzb where kczt in ('1','2') and id in (select kcrwzbid from xckc_rwcb where kcbm=#{kcbm} and sffk ='0' and ZPRY is not null) ) union all select sqid from xckc_rwzb where kczt in ('1','2') and id in (select kcrwzbid from xckc_rwcb where kcbm=#{kcbm} and sffk ='0' and ZPRY is not null) )

select * from get_xckcxx where id in (select xmid from xm_xckc_rela where xckcid in (select id from xckc_rwzb where kczt = '3' and id in (select kcrwzbid from XCKC_RWCB t WHERE fksj is not null group by kcrwzbid) )
union all
select sqid from xckc_rwzb where kczt = '3' and id in (select kcrwzbid from XCKC_RWCB t WHERE fksj is not null group by kcrwzbid) )

select * from GET_XCKCXX where id in (select xmid from xm_xckc_rela where xckcid in (select id from xckc_rwzb where kczt = '4' and id in (select kcrwzbid from XCKC_RWCB t WHERE fksj is not null group by kcrwzbid) ) union all select sqid from xckc_rwzb where kczt = '4' and id in (select kcrwzbid from XCKC_RWCB t WHERE fksj is not null group by kcrwzbid) )

select * from xckc_rwzb where 1=1
and kczt=#{kczt}
and kczt in ('1','2','3','4','5')
and kczt in ('1','2')
and (id in (select xckcid from xm_xckc_rela where xmid = #{xmid}) or sqid = #{xmid})
select * from xckc_rwzb where 1=1 and kczt in ('1','2','3','4','5') and (id in (select xckcid from xm_xckc_rela where xmid = #{xmid}) or sqid = #{xmid})
select * from XCKC_RWZB where kczt in ('1','2','3','4','5') and SQID = #{id}

select id,kcrwzbid,zpry,u.username,u.mobilephone, sfdc,sfxydc,dcsj,sffk,fkyj,fpr,fpsj,kcbm,fksj,to_char(fksj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') fksj_vue from xckc_rwcb b left join Xtgl_User u on b.zpry = u.userid where kcrwzbid in (select id from xckc_rwzb where id = #{kcrwzbid}) order by kcbm

SELECT a.*,get_kj_str(a.gxkj) kj_str,get_gxcz_str(a.gxcz) gxcz_str, get_zlwz_str(a.gxzzl) zlwz_str,get_zsffgw_str(a.gxzsf) zsffgw_str, to_char(a.DCRQ,'yyyy-mm-dd') dcrq_str,to_char(a.CYSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') cysj_str FROM XCKC_FK_QS a WHERE kcrwcbid = #{id} order by dcrq

select t.*,to_char(t.SCSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj_str, GET_FJZL_STR(t.fjlx_ej) fjlx_str, F_GET_USERNAME(t.scr) scr_str from ${tablename} t where t.KCFKID = #{kcrwcbid} and t.sc_flag ='0' order by scsj desc

select t.id,t.name fjlxEjname,t.parentid,count(c.id) count from XTGL_FJZLGL t left join (select * from XCKC_RWCB_FJ where sc_flag=0 and KCFKID = #{cbid}) c on t.id = c.fjlx_ej where t.parentid in (select id from XTGL_FJZLGL where type='sjyxkylx') group by t.sort,t.id,t.name,t.parentid order by t.sort,t.id,t.name,t.parentid

select t.id,t.name fjlxEjname,t.parentid,count(c.id) count from XTGL_FJZLGL t left join (select * from XCKC_FK_SGDW_FJ where sc_flag=0 and KCFKID = #{cbid}) c on t.id = c.fjlx_ej where t.parentid in (select id from XTGL_FJZLGL where type='sgdwxkylx') group by t.sort,t.id,t.name,t.parentid order by t.sort,t.id,t.name,t.parentid

select t.*,to_char(t.SCSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj_str, GET_FJZL_STR(t.fjlx_ej) fjlx_str, F_GET_USERNAME(t.scr) scr_str from ${tablename} t where t.KCRWZBID = #{kcrwzbid} and t.sc_flag ='0' order by scsj desc
select t.*,to_char(t.SCSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj_str, GET_FJZL_STR(t.fjlx_ej) fjlx_str, F_GET_USERNAME(t.scr) scr_str from xckc_fk_sgdw_fj t where t.kcfkid = #{kcrwcbid} and t.sc_flag ='0'
select t.* from XCKC_FK_SGDW t where t.kcrwcbid = #{kcrwcbid}

select count(1) from GET_LXLB t where 1=1 and t.sflx = #{sflx}
and t.sqbh LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{sqbh}, '%'))
and t.xmjl = #{xmjl}
and t.dwmc LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{dwmc},'%'))
and t.lxr LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{lxr},'%'))
and to_date(t.slrq,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(#{kssj},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(t.slrq,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= to_date(#{jssj},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select count(1) from XM_INSTANCE t where t.pxmid is null
and t.xmbh LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{xmbh}, '%'))
and t.xmmc LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{xmmc},'%'))
and t.LXSJ >= to_date(#{kssj},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and t.LXSJ < to_date(#{jssj},'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
select * from YWSL_XJXQSQB where id =#{id}
select * from YWSL_CHGZSQB where id =#{id}
select * from YWSL_GSHBSQB where id =#{id}
select * from XM_INSTANCE where PXMID is NULL
mapper.update: update YWSL_XJXQSQ_LDXX set xmid = #{xmid} where SQID = #{sqid}
mapper.select: select t.*,t.PROC_INST_ID procInstId,t.TABLE_NAME tableName from WF_RU_INST_CONTENT t where PROC_INST_ID = #{id}
select count(1) from XM_INSTANCE where PXMID = #{id}
select t.*,to_char(t.scsj,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') scsj_str from ${tablename} t where ${name} = #{id} and sc_flag = '0'

select a.id,a.FJLX_YJ fjlxYj,a.FJLX_EJ fjlxEj,a.fjlj,a.fjhz,a.fjmc,b.USERNAME scr,to_char(a.SCSJ,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') scsj_vue from ${tablename} a left join XTGL_USER b on a.SCR=b.USERID where ${fieldname} =#{sqdid} and FJLX_EJ=#{fjlx} and sc_flag=0

select a.mc kj_str,b.mc gxcz_str,c.mc zsffgw_str,d.mc zlwz_str,t.id,t.kcrwcbid,t.sjstgwdcid,t.dcnr,t.gxzl,t.gxld,t.gxjzl,t.gxzzl,t.gxzsf,t.gxkj, t.gxcz,t.cydx,t.cysj,t.dcdwz,t.cydbg,t.cydyl,t.gwyj,t.bwts,t.dcr,t.dcrq, to_char(t.dcrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') dcrq_str,to_char(t.cysj,'yyyy-mm-dd') cysj_str, t.bz,t.xmid, t.cjr, t.cjsj,t.cydsd from XCKC_FK_QS t left join xtgl_kj a on t.gxkj=a.bh left join XTGL_GXCZ b on t.gxcz=b.bh left join XTGL_GXSF c on t.gxzsf=c.bh left join XTGL_FX d on t.gxzzl=d.bh where t.kcrwcbid=#{kcrwcbid} and t.dcnr=#{dcnr}
